channel.title: Carsten's Blog
channel.description: Professional Software Developer, Computer Graphics Researcher, former GTA Modder and Video Games Enthusiast

item.title: Yet another blog arrives!
item.description: Today marks the day, I am re-launching my blog, that I promise to maintain on an irregular basis.
item.content:encoded: Today marks the day, I am re-launching my blog, that I promise to maintain on an irregular basis.
